original_title: I'll Be Next Door for Christmas
overview: A comedy about a family that's crazy for Christmas. Except for the 16-year-old daughter -- her family's over-the-top Christmas celebrations have made her life miserable. When her long distance boyfriend decides to visit for the holidays, she's determined to spare him her family's Christmas obsession, so she hires actors to play her parents and stages a fake Christmas dinner in the empty house next door. What could go wrong?
tagline: This Christmas is about to get as ugly as the sweaters.
title: I'll Be Next Door for Christmas
